perturbation.original_text:
Wade Enterprises, Athlete and together
with Naked, are each referred to herein as a “Party” and collectively, the “Parties”.
perturbation.changed_text:
Wade Enterprises, Athlete and together
with Naked, are each referred to herein as a “Party” but only Wade Enterprises are collectively the “Parties”.
perturbation.explanation: By stating that 'Parties' collectively refers to only Wade Enterprises, this modification creates legal ambiguity. Contracts require clear identification of all parties involved; limiting the collective definition to only one entity while still listing others undermines the contract's clarity. This could affect enforcement, particularly concerning obligations and liabilities.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles - Ambiguity and Party Identification

perturbation.original_text:
Royalties. As consideration for Wade’s services under this Agreement, Naked will pay Wade royalties as follows:
A. Royalties. Naked will report, and Wade will be paid, royalty payments at [***]
perturbation.changed_text:
Compensation. As consideration for Wade’s services under this Agreement, Naked may choose to compensate Wade with gratuity as follows:
A. Gratuities. Naked will report, and Wade will be given, compensation payments at [***]
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'Royalties' to 'Gratuities' fundamentally alters the nature of payment. Royalties imply a percentage of sales or revenue, creating a direct financial stake. 'Gratuities,' however, are discretionary payments, removing the guaranteed compensation aspect. This contradicts standard business practice and could invalidate the payment terms.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Contract Law Principles - Consideration and Payment Terms

perturbation.original_text:
Nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to place the Parties in the relationship of
partners, joint venturers, principal-agents, or employer-employee, it being understood that the Parties are and will remain independent contractors
in all respects and neither Party shall have any right to obligate or bind the other in any manner whatsoever.
perturbation.changed_text:
Nothing contained in this Agreement shall be deemed or construed to place the Parties in the relationship of partners, joint venturers, or employer-employee, it being understood that the Parties are and will remain principal-agents
in all respects and neither Party shall have any right to obligate or bind the other in any manner whatsoever.
perturbation.explanation: By stating that the parties are principal-agents in all respects, this modification creates legal uncertainty. This directly conflicts with the original intention that they are independent contractors. This reclassification has significant legal implications, potentially imposing fiduciary duties and altering liability structures, thereby complicating contract enforcement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Agency Law vs. Independent Contractor Law
